src

Class FontChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.FontChooser

  • public class FontChooser
extends java.lang.Object
    ComboBox with list of accessible font familys. TTF fonts are stored in /user_data/fonts so the list may be updated any time.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    PopovaSS

      • getFontByName

        private static java.awt.Font getFontByName(java.lang.String fontName,
                                           java.awt.Font currentFont)
        Gets font out of fontList if there is a font with given name or returns the default font
        Parameters:
        fontName - (String) name of font to return
        currentFont - font that is currently set to the selected text
        Returns:
        Font Either a font of given fontName or a currentFont if no font is available

      • fillFontData

        protected static boolean fillFontData()
        Reads /user_data/fonts to reach accessible fonts
        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not font library readed successfully
